rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No content illegal in The Netherlands.
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information.
Add a Content Warning (CW) to any toots that may hurt or trigger people like religion, gore, spoilers, or sensitive topics.

records.text: Do people find the white frames here highly objectionable? When putting stuff on insta I normally have to extend images to square because you can't really mix portrait and landscape oriented images.  It's a PITA to do in snapseed, so I figured I'd just get #darktable to do it for me, but that means all my exports will have it, and it's even less convenient to crop it out when posting here  It looks a bit crap in the web interface, and means portrait images especially end up a lot smaller.

records.text: Do people find the white frames here highly objectionable? When putting stuff on insta I normally have to extend images to square because you can't really mix portrait and landscape oriented images.  It's a PITA to do in snapseed, so I figured I'd just get #darktable to do it for me, but that means all my exports will have it, and it's even less convenient to crop it out when posting here  It looks a bit crap in the web interface, and means portrait images especially end up a lot smaller.
